text: Carl Bert Albert (May 10, 1908 â€“ February 4, 2000) was an American lawyer and a Democratic American politician from Oklahoma. He served as Speaker of the United States House of Representatives from 1971 to 1977. ==Other websites== * The Carl Albert Center at the University of Oklahoma * Carl Albert Center Biography of Carl Albert * Carl Albert State College Home Page * The Chickasaw Nation of Oklahoma Home Page * Encyclopedia of Oklahoma History and Culture - Albert, Carl * Oral History Interviews with Carl Albert, from the Lyndon Baines Johnson Library * * Interview: Life and Career of Carl Albert C-SPAN Video Library Category:1908 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Lawyers from Oklahoma Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:American colonels Category:Speakers of the United States House of Representatives Category:United States representatives from Oklahoma Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:20th-century American politicians Category:Rhodes scholars Category:Majority leaders of the United States House of Representatives Category:Military people from Oklahoma Category:People from McAlester, Oklahoma
title: Carl Albert
